GameConsole.Core

类 WindowMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameConsole.Core.WindowMain

  • public class WindowMain
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to display the interface of the game where the player can visually perform game operations.

      • newGameState

        public java.lang.String newGameState(java.lang.String path,
                                     java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> strategies,
                                     int gameTurns)
        This method is to help display the detailed items of the report of the results at the end of the tournament
        参数:
        path - map path with String type
        strategies - the list of different computer players strategies with ArrayList type
        gameTurns - the number of turns for each game
        返回:
        a draw with String type after the turns
